mapper.insert: INSERT INTO booking (rental_id, user_id, status, start_date, end_date, rental_period, cost, amount, create_time) VALUES (#{rentalId}, #{userId}, #{status}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{rentalPeriod}, #{cost}, #{amount}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE booking SET status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.select: SELECT amount FROM booking WHERE id = #{id} AND status = #{status}

SELECT b.id AS bookingId, b.rental_id AS rentalId, r.title AS title, b.start_date AS startDate, b.end_date AS endDate from booking b join rental r on b.rental_id = r.id WHERE b.status = #{status} AND b.user_id = #{id};
